But one of the best ways to explore Varanasi
is just on foot walking along the river on

these ghats, and there are multiple, many

like a series of steps that leads down to
the river. So it makes a really great place

to walk around. It's peaceful, yet at the
same time it's mystical, it's really magical
as well.

One of the best ways to explore Varanasi is
by walking through the narrow alleyways, umm,

these alleyways are all over near the Ganges
river, and it's a maze, but it's filled with

shops, there's temples, little shrines, there's
restaurants and street food, but it's just

an always entertaining area to walk around
with many many people and just one of the

joys of visiting Varanasi is just to explore
these back alleys.
